attributes.action: Help to keep Ewing school open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ewing School is the only school in Manchester catering exclusively for pupils aged five to sixteen experiencing Every type of Autism. They want to put the children of Ewing School back into Mainstream schools, which hasnt worked fo the pupils in the past as they need the help provided in this school. Please sign this petition, as we need as many signitures as possible, and if we are able to keep this school open, you will be helping these children to get the right start to life!
